import React from 'react'; import './About.css'; import theme from '../ImagesLogo/about-us.png'; import aboutimg from '../ImagesLogo/profile.jpg'; // import skillicon from '../ImagesLogo/self-development.png'; import htmlicon from '../ImagesLogo/html-5.png'; function About() { return (

About Me

I am a passionate front-end developer with a strong enthusiasm for building engaging and acessible web application.With a solid understanding of core web technologies like HTML,CSS, and JavaScript,I have completed several projects that highlight my skills in responsive design and user interface development.

My journey into web development began with a fascination for how websites are built and function. This curiosity led me to embark on various projects, where I enjoy solving challenges while continuously learning about new technologies and best practices in front-end development.

I'm excited to collaborate with others and work as part of a team to contribute to innovative projects that push the boundaries of web design. In my spare time, I love exploring design trends, tackling coding challenges, and sharing my knowledge through a personal blog.

Skills

JavaScript

React JS

Python

) } export default About
